title: IshanE shakti vilAsa
sahitya:
IshanE shakti vilAsa mahEshanE


anupallavi

  dAsarin nEsanE dAnavar nAshanE


caraNam 1    annaiyE appanE anbarukkanbanE unnaiyE nambinEn ennuyir nAthanE
    caraNam 2    shUdu porAmaigaL vAdu sheyyAmalun pAdukApp-IndaruL sAdhu samrakSakA
    caraNam 3    poi ahankArattaik-koid-aDivEruDan mei uNarvOngiya deiva jIvanam aruL
